channel.title: Allstars source
channel.description: I have a little problem. There is a trade problem after I finish a shop. I click to trade the shop keeper and my server disconnects and rejoins. Since I want to start from a new slate, should I just delete all shops and autospawns? any good recommendations for allstars bugged source lol

item.title: Allstars source
item.dc:creator: @dogzound5 dogzound5@gmail.com
item.description:
@dogzound5 wrote:

I did and I removed it! Thanks for the help. I have a question. What are the normal coordinate for nonwild?? and wild?? I need to add them into the boolean data. Also, allstar used a in game text for safe outside of wild and wild for when you are actually in the wild. How do I just change it to the normal wild level system?

Read full topic

item.title: Allstars source
item.dc:creator: @Elven_Dremor Elven Dremor
item.description:
@Elven_Dremor wrote:

go to your client.java and hit ctrl + f and type this in search bar

@gre@A

Erase that and put what you want it to say.

Read full topic

This is in the client class, it is loading an interface.

item.title: Allstars source
item.dc:creator: @dogzound5 dogzound5@gmail.com
item.description:
@dogzound5 wrote:

Yes but the allstar thing is in green and white so there is color code around each letter. ex. @gre@a@whi@l and that continues to allstar. I will try to search for it one more time.

item.title: Allstars source
item.dc:creator: @dogzound5 dogzound5@gmail.com
item.description:
@dogzound5 wrote:

I just cleaned out my whole autospawn and shops and wanneshops in client.java. Now I need to clean out one more thing that is really annoying. Everytime the server refreshes a white and green “Allstar” appears at the top of the client and then it flashes the number of players online. What file is this in? I have looked in almost all folders but haven’t found it yet.

Read full topic

item.title: Allstars source
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Use Czar Cleaned, it has a 385KB client class I believe, but all the skills besides combat ones are erased. It’s a good start if you want to start clean, but make sure your code is under the right packet for clicking NPCs as for your question.

Read full topic

item.title: Allstars source
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

Allstar is amazing if u know what to do with it! When ever you download a source you should Clean it not just build onto what the other person was doing

Read full topic
